summary: This document is a brief email or text message regarding the approval of $800,000 for a new camera system, indicating financial transactions and procurement activities. The recipient is informed that their paperwork is in order and to prepare for the funds to be obligated quickly.

persons.name: Mr._....
persons.context: The sender mentions just getting off the phone with this person, who appears to be involved in the approval or discussion of the $800,000 for a new camera system.

events.title: Approval of $800,000 for Camera System
events.description: An $800,000 payment for a new camera system is approved, with paperwork confirmed to be in order and instructions to prepare for immediate obligation of funds.

keyFacts: An $800,000 payment for a new camera system was approved on July 10, 2019.
The recipient's paperwork was confirmed to be in order, indicating a formal procurement process.
The funds were expected to need obligation 'ASAP', suggesting urgency in the transaction.
